it.unibz.pomodroid
Class Services

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      it.unibz.pomodroid.SharedActivity
          it.unibz.pomodroid.Services

public class Services
extends SharedActivity

This class is in charge of retrieving tickets from trac and seding events to prom.

Author:
Daniel Graziotin 4801 , Thomas Schievenin 5701
See Also:
SharedActivity

Constant Field Values

useServices

protected Runnable useServices
As soon as a thread starts, this method is called. If serviceChosen == SERVICE_PROM, it sends the events to PROM. If serviceChosen == SERVICE_TRAC, it retrieves tickets from TRAC. When the operation is finished,it sends an empty message to the handler in order to inform the system that the operation is finished.

handler

private Handler handler
This handler waits until the method run() sends an empty message in order to inform us that the "retrieving phase" is finished.

retrieveTicketsFromTrac

private void retrieveTicketsFromTrac()
Throws:
PomodroidException - This method takes all not-closed tickets from track, then inserts them into the local DB.

Throws:
PomodroidException - This method takes all not-closed tickets from trac, then inserts them into the local DB.
